A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Spectacle over substance. This is enjoyable for non-core fans of Star Wars but for those who have been fans since the first trilogy will be disappointed. 

Wasted characters\, talent and setup.

While a beautiful looking movie\, the sub-plots\, character flaws and continuity errors are distracting for fans of the franchise. Every major promise from the previous movie is thrown away and the space western is turned into a chase movie that should be titled "Space Escape - resistance and sulky old man run away"

Disney also continues their approach to dropping a joke a minute in every scene and sequence because\, apparently\, that is entertainment now.
